description: Open Source developers are your secret weapon: This talk will discuss the continued shift we see in companies the world over in embracing open source, why it's a fundamental competitive and social advantage in engaging developers, and how the benefits of Open Source, Open Community and Open Design are changing the landscape for businesses.

title: Jesse Noller: Keynote - Embracing Openness as a Competitive Advantage
